channel.title: Comments on: Updates, or, How the Stories End

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Good stories Foton, people never cease to entertain and irritate each other.
item.content:encoded: Good stories Foton, people never cease to entertain and irritate each other.

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
As a recruitment officer I often wish I could make a master list on my realm forum stating why each applicant is denied. Alas that would only start flame wars. It would be nice to share this information though.
Particulairly the people that apply saying "Im not about loot" then dont make it through the application process stating "wtf why didnt i get that item".
Though kicking out the guy that turned out to be a huge racist and then seeing him in another fairly reputable guild kinda bothered me too.
I find myself too often saying "Why cant people just NOT be jackasses.. comeon.. its no hard"
item.content:encoded:
As a recruitment officer I often wish I could make a master list on my realm forum stating why each applicant is denied. Alas that would only start flame wars. It would be nice to share this information though.

Particulairly the people that apply saying “Im not about loot” then dont make it through the application process stating “wtf why didnt i get that item”.

Though kicking out the guy that turned out to be a huge racist and then seeing him in another fairly reputable guild kinda bothered me too.

I find myself too often saying “Why cant people just NOT be jackasses.. comeon.. its no hard”

item.title: By: Brett
item.dc:creator: Brett
item.description: I swear to god I am glad I haven't been part of this sort of nonsense, but I do love reading about it. I am sure this is exactly how people get hooked on Soap Operas.
item.content:encoded: I swear to god I am glad I haven’t been part of this sort of nonsense, but I do love reading about it. I am sure this is exactly how people get hooked on Soap Operas.

item.title: By: Jiffy
item.dc:creator: Jiffy
item.description: Having always been a part of a guild of close knit friends (usually only ever 10 of us or so), I've never been a part of a guild of strangers, and guild drama. I love reading this stuff Foton. Keep 'em coming.
item.content:encoded: Having always been a part of a guild of close knit friends (usually only ever 10 of us or so), I’ve never been a part of a guild of strangers, and guild drama. I love reading this stuff Foton. Keep ’em coming.
